headline: Is L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) the Best Value Dividend Stock to Invest in According to the Media?
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Best Value Dividend Stocks to Invest in According to the Media. In this article, we are going to take a look at where L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) stands against other best value dividend stocks. In just a few weeks, investor sentiment has shifted dramatically—from optimism after the elections […]
